comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: "Austin Melvin Knight (December 16, 1854 - February 26, 1927) was an admiral in the United States Navy. He was commander in chief of the U.S. Asiatic Fleet from 1917 to 1918. His textbook Modern Seamanship was a standard reference for over eight decades." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Austin_M._Knight
